titles: An answer to Mr. Henry Payne's letter concerning His Majesty's declaration of indulgence, writ to the author of the Letter to a dissenter
author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
notes: Signed: T.T. [i.e. Gilbert Burnet]. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Payne, Henry Neville, fl. 1672-1710. --  Answer to a scandalous pamphlet entituled, A letter to a dissenter concerning His Majesties late declaration of indulgence.
Halifax, George Savile, --  Marquis of, 1633-1695. --  Letter to a dissenter.
